text: @weijia Trump needs to have his brain scanned for signs of normal activity? When none is found 25th Amendment needs to be invoked.  Who admits they slowed coronavirus testing and isn't thrown out of office? He's admitting he is allowing more people to DIE on purpose! Senate do something!
